title: In Rome, Maria Grazia Chiuri's final bow
subhead: It was in her hometown that Dior's artistic director, Maria Grazia Chiuri, chose to stage her farewell show on May 27. Though nothing was revealed that day about her departure, the designer decided to celebrate the art and culture of the Italian capital, where she has just brought a small theater back to life near the Forum.

title: The life and death of Julie, 21, swept up in the spiral of social media
subhead: Julie Pospieszny's tragic fate was that of a young woman of her generation, born into the age of social media and a victim of the violence it can unleash. Caught in the spiral of easy money and addicted to laughing gas, the influencer died in March. She was 21 years old.

title: French-Algerian woman given 48 hours to leave France in incomprehensible deportation order
subhead: A 58-year-old mother, who has been living in France since 1993 and holds dual nationality, was detained for an entire afternoon by border police at a Paris airport. She is contesting the order to leave French territory that was served to her.
